gov.nih.nlm.meme.server
Class MEMEApplicationServer

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.meme.server.MEMEApplicationServer

Direct Known Subclasses:
MRDApplicationServer
public class MEMEApplicationServer
extends Object
implements InitializationContext

The application entry point. This is the application server.

Author:
MEME Group

processRequest

public void processRequest(MEMEServiceRequest request)
                    throws MEMEException
Receives a request from the listener and responsible to package the request into a session context and call the right handler.

Parameters:
request - the MEMEServiceRequest
Throws:
MEMEException - If failed to process the request

manageSession

protected SessionContext manageSession(MEMEServiceRequest request)
                                throws BadValueException,
                                       ExpiredSessionException
Implements the Session architecture. If a request is initiating a session, it creates the new session. If a request is using an existing session_id, it looks up the session in the map. If the id is no good, it determines if the session is just old or if the ID is actually illegal and reports the error. If a request is terminating a session, it removes the session from the map and returns. Finally if a request wants nosession, a single-use context object is created.

Parameters:
request - the MEMEServiceRequest
Returns:
the SessionContext
Throws:
BadValueException - if failed to manage the session
ExpiredSessionException - if failed due to session expiration

manageEndOfRequest

protected void manageEndOfRequest(SessionContext context,
                                  MEMEServiceRequest request)
                           throws MEMEException
Handles the end of a request. It primarily returns resources used by the context which will not be needed i n future requests.

Parameters:
context - the SessionContext
request - the MEMEServiceRequest
Throws:
MEMEException - if failed to manage end of request

getDataSource

public MEMEDataSource getDataSource(String mid_service,
                                    String user,
                                    String password)
                             throws MEMEException
Returns the correct kind of MEMEDataSource for this server. The purpose of this method is to allow the MRDApplicationServer to return MRD database connections instead of MID database connections.

Parameters:
mid_service - the mid services name
user - the username
password - the password
Returns:
the MIDDataSource
Throws:
MEMEException - if failed to get the data source

returnDataSource

public void returnDataSource(MEMEDataSource ds)
                      throws MEMEException
Returns the data source to the server toolkit. The purpose of this method is to allow the MRDApplicationServer to return MRD database connections instead of MID database connections.

Parameters:
ds - the MEMEDataSource
Throws:
MEMEException - if failed to return data source

stop

public void stop()
Shuts down the listener to ensure that no new connection can enter the system. It really should wait until any processes still running are finished. Waiting until things are all finished will require waiting until the thread pool has only inactive threads. We currently do not have a mechanism for this, so instead, we will have a place holder for it which will be a call to ServerToolkit.waitUntilThreadPoolInactive().

main

public static void main(String[] s)
Entry point, starts server.

Parameters:
s - command line args
